Text:
(o) 2013.1.31 Changelog:

* Fixed an incorrect SFC/WFP registry key entry.
* Changed the RunOnce Startup Process.

man this version sucks  no audio working
is full with bugs   not recomend
LuxLOL, i need to know if this os will load up to a laptop that only says "disc read error" on start up, the laptop originally came with xp professional. thanks for any info you may have.
That's hard to say, try to run Check Disk and try to make a test Installation (Read Me file).

I've been using your images since 2010. Very good work, saved me hundreds of hours.

One request, why not integrate .NET 4.5? It has officially replaced .NET 4.0

http://www.wincert.net/forum/topic/10480-slim-net-framework-45-full-x86x64-1-08-2013/

Great work. Been a fan since 2010 and you've saved me hundreds of hours of time with your slip-streamed updates.

One question, why haven't you switched to .NET 4.5 yet?

http://www.wincert.net/forum/topic/10480-slim-net-framework-45-full-x86x64-1-08-2013/
can i boot this from USB?
If you know how yes. It's no different than a normal Windows XP.

It works great... Thanks man!
Me funcionó perfectamente, lo recomiendo!
i tried to install it with usb,but during the installation it says can't copy file setuporg.exe and presetup.cmd,how to solve this problem?
Download the latest version i added a new USB Flash installer instauration in the Read Me file.
